DataElement.preferredName: Image Positive Lesion Distance From Nipple CM Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The depth from skin to center of cyst (to nearest 0.5 cm) of a positive observation in an imaging study.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A positive observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganismas a result of an imaging study.  [Manually-curated]

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition:
Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.:An observation confirming something, such as the
presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.

Concepts.definition: Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.
A finding of abnormality following an examination or observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.

Property.preferredDefinition: (LEE-zhun) An area of abnormal tissue change.

Concepts.definition: A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

DataElementConcept.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 11/6/12 jc  Add to ACRIN Image Finding CSI; remove from caBIG ACRIN CSI.  9/17/07 - released for reuse by C3PR.  3/20/07 - Created to support ACRIN Breast CDE development task; 3/14/07-updated for EVS term recommendation.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Lesion Distance From Nipple CM Number
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Depth from skin to center of cyst (to nearest 0.5 cm) [Manually-curated]

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Used to indicate a specified place or time as a starting point.:The pigmented projection on the surface of the breast. Ducts that conduct milk from the mammary glands to the surface of the breast exit through the nipple. (from MedTerms Medical Dictionary; medterms.com):Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: Used to indicate a specified place or time as a starting point; used to indicate a source, cause, agent, or instrument.
The pigmented protuberance on the surface of the breast through which milk is drawn from the breast.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 10/31/12 jc  Released as part of draft VD review with Tina Taylor.  3/20/07 jc Created to support ACRIN Breast CDE development task.

DataElement.changeDescription: 10/14/13 Removed caBIG-ACRIN Breast Ultrasound CSI; added equivalent modality and Under Review ECOG-ACRIN CSI. jc   10/31/12 Released as part of draft VD review with Tina Taylor. jc   3/26/07 jc Created to support ACRIN Breast CDE development task.
